content:
Prev: Port vista Up: Montjuïc Next: Turret

Moat garden



We're not sure this really was a moat, but it looks like it could have been one. The people in the foreground are walking over the moat on a drawbridge leading to a portcullis into the fortress. In the background is one of the cable cars we rode up to the castle in.
Taken Thursday, September 13, 2001, 06:44:03pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 1.0Mb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/200s @ F3.2, ISO 100, 78mm
